service.name: /psal319.ps
service.query:
WITH SALE_LIST AS ( SELECT A.STR_CD , A.SALE_DT --, SUBSTR(A.SALE_TIME,1,2)||'00' SALE_TIME --, A.SALE_TIME , CASE WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '0700' AND '0899' THEN '0900' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '0900' AND '0999' THEN '1000' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1000' AND '1099' THEN '1100' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1100' AND '1199' THEN '1200' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1200' AND '1299' THEN '1300' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1300' AND '1399' THEN '1400' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1400' AND '1499' THEN '1500' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1500' AND '1599' THEN '1600' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1600' AND '1699' THEN '1700' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1700' AND '1799' THEN '1800' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1800' AND '1899' THEN '1900' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '1900' AND '1999' THEN '2000' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '2000' AND '2099' THEN '2100' WHEN SALE_TIME BETWEEN '2100' AND '2399' THEN '2200' END SALE_TIME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DT),'D') WEEK_CD , DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DT),'D'),'1','(일)','2','(월)','3','(화)','4','(수)','5','(목)','6','(금)','7','(토)',NULL) WEEK , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.FLOR_CD , A.NORM_SALE_AMT , A.CUST_CNT , TO_DATE(?) - TO_DATE(?) + 1 AS DT FROM DPS.PS_TIMEPBN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ?
AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD NOT IN ( SELECT COMM_CODE FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE COMM_PART='D213' AND USE_YN='Y' ) -- 수기등록 브랜드 제외

UNION ALL SELECT A.STR_CD , A.SALE_DT , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '0700' AND '0899' THEN '0900' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '0900' AND '0999' THEN '1000' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1000' AND '1099' THEN '1100' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1100' AND '1199' THEN '1200' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1200' AND '1299' THEN '1300' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1300' AND '1399' THEN '1400' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1400' AND '1499' THEN '1500' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1500' AND '1599' THEN '1600' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1600' AND '1699' THEN '1700' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1700' AND '1799' THEN '1800' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1800' AND '1899' THEN '1900' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '1900' AND '1999' THEN '2000' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '2000' AND '2099' THEN '2100' WHEN TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE,'HH24MI') BETWEEN '2100' AND '2399' THEN '2200' END SALE_TIME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DT),'D') WEEK_CD , DECODE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DT),'D'),'1','(일)','2','(월)','3','(화)','4','(수)','5','(목)','6','(금)','7','(토)',NULL) WEEK , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.FLOR_CD , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG,0,-1,1) * A.SALE_AMT NORM_SALE_AMT , DECODE(A.TRAN_FLAG,0,-1,1) * A.CUST_CNT CUST_CNT , TO_DATE(?) - TO_DATE(?) + 1 DT FROM DPS.PS_SALEETC A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.EVENT_FLAG >= '91' AND A.PUMBUN_CD NOT IN ( SELECT COMM_CODE FROM COM.TC_COMMCODE WHERE COMM_PART='D213' AND USE_YN='Y' ) -- 수기등록 브랜드 제외

SELECT STR_CD , SALE_DT , '~'||SALE_TIME SALE_TIME , MIN(WEEK_CD) WEEK_CD , MIN(WEEK) WEEK , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))AMT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_18 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_18 , SUM(NVL(CUST_CNT,0)) CNT_TOT , SUM(NVL(NORM_SALE_AMT,0)) AMT_TOT , ? UNIT , 3 ORD FROM SALE_LIST WHERE SALE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY STR_CD , SALE_DT , SALE_TIME

-- 기간 누계 UNION ALL SELECT STR_CD , '기간 누계' SALE_DT , '~'||SALE_TIME SALE_TIME , '' WEEK_CD , '' WEEK , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))AMT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',CUST_CNT,0),0)) CNT_18 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0)) AMT_18 , SUM(NVL(CUST_CNT,0)) CNT_TOT , SUM(NVL(NORM_SALE_AMT,0)) AMT_TOT , ? UNIT , 2 ORD FROM SALE_LIST WHERE SALE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY STR_CD , SALE_TIME

-- 평균 누계 UNION ALL SELECT STR_CD , '누계 평균' SALE_DT , '~'||SALE_TIME SALE_TIME , '' WEEK_CD , '' WEEK , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'B1',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_B1 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'01',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_01 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'02',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_02 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'03',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_03 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'04',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_04 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'05',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT)AMT_05 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'06',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_06 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'07',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_07 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'08',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_08 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'09',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_09 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'10',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_10 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'11',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_11 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'12',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_12 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'13',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_13 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'14',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_14 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'15',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_15 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'16',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_16 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'17',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_17 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',CUST_CNT,0),0))/MIN(DT) CNT_18 , SUM(NVL(DECODE(FLOR_CD,'18',NORM_SALE_AMT,0),0))/MIN(DT) AMT_18 , SUM(NVL(CUST_CNT,0))/MIN(DT) CNT_TOT , SUM(NVL(NORM_SALE_AMT,0))/MIN(DT) AMT_TOT , ? UNIT , 1 ORD FROM SALE_LIST WHERE SALE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY STR_CD , SALE_TIME
ORDER BY ORD, STR_CD, SALE_DT, SALE_TIME
